Usage exampleÔÉÅ

 1from mgconfig import Configuration, DefaultValues, PostProcessing, DefaultFunctions, ConfigTypes, configuration_logger
 2from ext_default_functions import default_hostname, default_timezone
 3from ext_postprocessing import extend_timezone_configuration, LOCAL_TZ_ID
 4from ext_config_types import parse_filename
 5import logging
 6from ext_app_header import AppHeader
 7
 8CONFIG_DEFINITIONS_YAML = [
 9    "config_defs/config_def__app.yml",
10    "config_defs/config_def__example.yml"
11]
12
13
14# ---------------------------------------------------------------------
15# configuration types extensions - example
16# ---------------------------------------------------------------------
17ConfigTypes.add_type('minutes', int,
18                     ConfigTypes._parse_int_positive, str, None)
19ConfigTypes.add_type('seconds', int,
20                     ConfigTypes._parse_int_positive, str, None)
21ConfigTypes.add_type('filename', str, parse_filename, None, None)
22
23
24# ---------------------------------------------------------------------
25# application logger example
26# ---------------------------------------------------------------------
27logging.basicConfig(level=logging.DEBUG)
28app_logger = logging.getLogger("example_usage")
29configuration_logger.replace_logger(app_logger)
30
31# ---------------------------------------------------------------------
32# default values - example
33# ---------------------------------------------------------------------
34DefaultValues().clear()
35
36# ---------------------------------------------------------------------
37# default functions - example
38# ---------------------------------------------------------------------
39DefaultFunctions().add('hostname', default_hostname)
40DefaultFunctions().add('timezone', default_timezone)
41
42# ---------------------------------------------------------------------
43# post-processing - example
44# ---------------------------------------------------------------------
45PostProcessing().add(extend_timezone_configuration)
46
47# ---------------------------------------------------------------------
48# application header values - example
49# ---------------------------------------------------------------------
50AppHeader.name = 'testapp'
51AppHeader.title = 'Application Title'
52AppHeader.prefix = 'app'
53AppHeader.version = 'V1.0'
54
55# ---------------------------------------------------------------------
56# configuration item value creation
57# ---------------------------------------------------------------------
58config = Configuration(CONFIG_DEFINITIONS_YAML)
59
60# ---------------------------------------------------------------------
61# checking specific post-processing results
62# ---------------------------------------------------------------------
63if config.extended_item_exists(LOCAL_TZ_ID):
64    app_logger.info(
65        f'Local timezone: {config.get_extended_item(LOCAL_TZ_ID).zone}')
66    # value of 'local_tz' can be directly accessed as property using config.extended.local_tz
67else:
68    app_logger.info(
69        f'Configuration value for "{LOCAL_TZ_ID}" was not found.')
70
71print(ConfigTypes.list_all())
